msg: Refactoring some tests to use mocks

author: kentam
msg: Beehive webapp build process fixes and standardization, needed to make the petstore clean/build cycle work.
1) the Beehive webapp build process now builds all Java code using apt, instead of trying to figure out what
.java files use annotations and which ones don't.
2) All Java code (including controls -- *.jcx and *.jcs files) should be kept under WEB-INF/src.
3) To work around apt issues, shared pageflows that would normally be in the root of the webapp should instead
be in a directory under the webapp root called "webappRoot" (and should be declared as being in the "webappRoot"
